襹字的基本解释

襹
shī
〔襳（
sh卬 ）襹〕见“襳2”。

襹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shī］
［《廣韻》所宜切，平支，生。］
［《廣韻》所寄切，去寘，生。］
(1)羽毛丰盛貌。参见“襹襹”、“襳2襹”。
(2)毛羽下垂貌。参见“襂襹”。
(3)通“”。参见“襹褷”。

襹字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　襹； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1127第28
【唐韻】所宜切【集韻】【韻會】山宜切，?音簛。襳襹，毛羽衣貌。【張衡·西京賦】被毛羽之襳襹。　又襂襹。詳襂字註。　又上聲，所綺切，音躧。去聲，所寄切，音屣。義?同。

襹字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
襹字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shī]
["Guangyun" is suitable for cutting, flat branch, raw. ]
["Guang Yun" sent cut, go to set, and give birth. ]
(1) The feathers are rich and graceful. See "襹襹", "襹2襹".
(2) The appearance of drooping hairiness. See "puddling".
(3) Through "". See "Swaddling".
Slap
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　襹; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 1127 28
[Tang Yun] What is appropriate to cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Mountain is appropriate to cut,? Yin Zhu. Fleece, feathery appearance. 【Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu】It is ridden by feathers.　Fuck again. Detailed note of words.　Sound again, so Qiqie, and sound. To the sound, to send the cut, the sound. Righteous? Same.
